Profiles.description: Alternative to a single profile, allows for multiple tenants

Domain.description: The value in Primary domain in the Azure Active Directory Overview

Instance.description: The Azure Active Directory instance, e.g. "https://login.microsoftonline.com".

TenantId.description: The value in Directory (tenant) ID on the app registration Overview

ClientId.description: The value in Application (Client) ID on the app registration Overview

ClientSecret.description: The client secret created for the app registration

CallbackPath.description: The request path within the application's base path where the user-agent will be returned.

SignedOutCallbackPath.description: The uri where the user agent will be redirected to after application is signed out from the identity provider.

DisplayName.description: The display name for use on the login button

DenyLocalLogin.description: Allow users to login via Umbraco's standard login

AutoRedirectLoginToExternalProvider.description: Automatically redirect to the external login provider

SetGroupsOnLogin.description: The bindings for AD group to Umbraco group.

Icon.description: The icon to use on the login button

ButtonStyle.description: The style to use on the login button

GroupBindings.description: The bindings for AD group to Umbraco group

DefaultGroups.description: The groups to assign to users regardless of any AD groups assigned (defaults to none)

TokenCacheType.description: The token cache type to use
Represents the type of token cache to use
